thesongstress:PowerChord.NAME: Power Chord
thesongstress:PowerChord.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Gain !M! Strength. NL Exhaust.

thesongstress:Mend.NAME: Mend
thesongstress:Mend.DESCRIPTION: Cure. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.

thesongstress:Shimmer.NAME: Shimmer
thesongstress:Shimmer.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak. Use 1 Holy to gain !B! Block.

thesongstress:Expunge.NAME: Expunge
thesongstress:Expunge.DESCRIPTION: Take !D! damage. Exhaust !M! Curse or Status. NL Exhaust.
thesongstress:Expunge.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Take !D! damage. Exhaust !M! Curses or Statuses. NL Exhaust.

thesongstress:Abolish.NAME: Abolish
thesongstress:Abolish.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. Lose all Holy. Lose 3 Strength and Dexterity. NL Exhaust.

thesongstress:FaithsQuestioning.NAME: Faith's Questioning
thesongstress:FaithsQuestioning.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. Holy and Cure cards cost 0 for this turn. NL Exhaust.

thesongstress:Exorcism.NAME: Exorcism
thesongstress:Exorcism.DESCRIPTION: Apply 3 Vulnerable and Weak to all enemies. Gain !M! Holy.

thesongstress:Prayer.NAME: Prayer
thesongstress:Prayer.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, gain !M! Holy.

thesongstress:FaithsSaber.NAME: Faith's Saber
thesongstress:FaithsSaber.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Use 1 Holy to attack again.
